title: [Large-Scale] UDL-Based Nursing Education Design: Constructing an Inclusive Learning Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: A UDL-applied curriculum providing personalized learning experiences for nursing students with diverse academic backgrounds. A blended learning environment combining online platforms with offline practical training

learning_goals: Apply the three UDL (Universal Design for Learning) principles (engagement, representation, action/expression) to nursing education scenarios
Design three or more flexible assessment tools that account for individual differences among learners
Develop nursing education materials utilizing diverse learning media (text, video, simulation)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
